title: Woodson Negro Makers of History - causation

content.question: Woodson set the foundation for which of the following future developments?

choices.label: The establishment of historically Black colleges and universities
The creation of the field of African American Studies in the late 1960s
The emergence of schools for formerly enslaved children
The start of African Americansâ€™ connection to Africa through art and literature

content.answer: The creation of the field of African American Studies in the late 1960s

topic.text: 3.15: Black History Education and African American Studies

skill.text: 1.C: Identify and explain patterns, connections, or other relationships (causation, changes, continuities, comparison).
